item.title: writing
item.description: For anything writing-related, please email writing@arnavsood.com Fiction “Customer Feedback (Secondhand Alchemical Goods)” — Daily Science Fiction. “Local Perturbation” — Daily Science Fiction. Non-Fiction “Bounded Rationality” — Blanket Sea. Pushcart Prize nominee.

item.title: links
item.description: Some things I think are worth sharing. Scientific American: North American bird populations have declined 29% since 1970. NPR: As recently as 1960, fish used to be huge. Green Your Lab: Good people working on sustainable science. WIPP: How to warn people 10000 years from now about radioactive waste. Sylvia Jacobson: Was confined to a skyjacked plane for a week, and wrote a paper about it. Ken Liu: State Change (short story).
